name: PrimeVault
long_description: PrimeVault provides robust and regulatory-compliant infrastructure for enterprises and financial institutions to easily and securely integrate stablecoins, digital assets and blockchain / smart contracts into their financial workflows. Businesses and FIs issue, store and move billions in monthly value onchain using PrimeVault's battle-tested, high-reliability and high-performance infrastructure. PrimeVault leverages cutting-edge technologies such as sealed TEEs (Trusted Execution Environment), Formal Verification and MPC (Multiparty Computation) to offer powerful, secure, scalable and modular wallet infrastructure, programmable cross-chain treasury management, comprehensive portfolio tracking, seamless DeFi interoperability and extensive market connectivity covering all major liquidity and execution venues.
one_liner: Stablecoin payments, tokenization and crypto operations platform
